original_text: Evil thoughts come out from people's minds. As a result they do wrong things. They have sex in wrong ways. They rob people. They murder people.
korean_text: 속에서 곧 사람의 마음에서 나오는 것은 악한 생각 곧 음란과 도둑질과 살인과

sentences.original_text: Evil thoughts come out from people's minds
As a result they do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과 그들은 잘못된 일을 합니다

sentences.original_text: They have sex in wrong ways
